FAQs.title: FAQS
FAQs.sizeQuestion: How do I find my correct size?
FAQs.sizeAnswer: You can refer to the size chart on our website or contact us for assistance.
FAQs.customizationFeeQuestion: Is there an additional fee for customizations?
FAQs.customizationFeeAnswer: Basic customizations are free, but special customizations may incur additional costs.
FAQs.customDesignAnswer: Yes, we accept custom-designed orders. Please contact us for more details.
FAQs.shortPantsQuestion: Do you have short pants, dresses like Cẩm, Gụa, etc.?
FAQs.shortPantsAnswer: Yes, we have short pants, dresses like Cẩm, Gụa, and many other styles.
FAQs.madeToMeasureVsBespokeQuestion: What is the difference between Made to Measure and Bespoke?
FAQs.madeToMeasureVsBespokeAnswer: Made to Measure is based on your measurements, while Bespoke includes unique designs tailored to you.
FAQs.careInstructionsQuestion: What are the care instructions for your products?
FAQs.careInstructionsAnswer: Our products should be hand-washed or dry-cleaned to maintain their shape.
FAQs.returnQuestion: How do I return or exchange an item?
FAQs.returnAnswer: You can return or exchange items within 7 days of receipt. Please contact us for support.
FAQs.returnShippingFeeQuestion: Is there a shipping fee for returns?
FAQs.returnShippingFeeAnswer: Return shipping fees are borne by the customer, except in cases of our error.
FAQs.shippingOptionsQuestion: What shipping options does YALY offer?
FAQs.shippingOptionsAnswer: YALY offers standard and express shipping. Contact us for details on availability in your region.
FAQs.shippingCostQuestion: How much are the shipping costs?
FAQs.shippingCostAnswer: Shipping costs vary based on location and order size. You can see the cost at checkout.
FAQs.changeAddressQuestion: How can I change the delivery address of my order?
FAQs.changeAddressAnswer: You can change the delivery address by contacting us before the order is shipped.
FAQs.internationalShippingQuestion: Does YALY ship to international destinations?
FAQs.internationalShippingAnswer: Yes, YALY ships internationally. Additional fees may apply depending on the destination.
FAQs.trackOrderQuestion: How can I track my order?
FAQs.trackOrderAnswer: You’ll receive a tracking number via email once your order ships.
FAQs.deliveryTimeAnswer: Delivery typically takes 5-10 business days, depending on your location and shipping method.
FAQs.internationalDeliverySupportQuestion: Does YALY provide international delivery support?
FAQs.internationalDeliverySupportAnswer: Yes, we provide support for international deliveries. Contact us for assistance.
FAQs.paymentMethodsAnswer: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. Contact us for more options.
FAQs.taxesCustomsQuestion: Which taxes and customs fees are used for direct sales?
FAQs.taxesCustomsAnswer: Taxes and customs fees depend on your country’s regulations. These are calculated at checkout.
FAQs.costCoveredQuestion: Are the costs covered? Is there any additional cost information?
FAQs.costCoveredAnswer: Shipping costs are covered in the order total. Additional customs fees may apply depending on your location.
FAQs.placeOrderQuestion: How do I place an order?
FAQs.placeOrderAnswer: You can place an order by adding items to your cart and proceeding to checkout.
FAQs.orderConfirmationQuestion: Will I receive an order confirmation?
FAQs.orderConfirmationAnswer: Yes, you’ll receive a confirmation email with your order details after placing the order.
FAQs.cancelOrderAnswer: Yes, you can cancel your order before it ships by contacting us.
FAQs.wrongItemQuestion: What if I receive the wrong item?
FAQs.wrongItemAnswer: Please contact us immediately, and we’ll arrange for the correct item to be sent.
FAQs.damagedItemQuestion: What if my item arrives damaged?
FAQs.damagedItemAnswer: Contact us with photos of the damaged item, and we’ll assist with a replacement or refund.
FAQs.washSilkQuestion: How do I wash silk garments?
FAQs.washSilkAnswer: Silk garments should be hand-washed in cold water with a mild detergent.
FAQs.storeGarmentsQuestion: How should I store my garments?
FAQs.storeGarmentsAnswer: Store garments in a cool, dry place, preferably in a breathable garment bag.
FAQs.removeStainsQuestion: How do I remove stains from my garments?
FAQs.removeStainsAnswer: Treat stains immediately with a mild stain remover and follow care instructions.
FAQs.cashmereCareQuestion: How do I care for cashmere products?
FAQs.cashmereCareAnswer: Cashmere should be dry-cleaned or hand-washed with a gentle detergent.
FAQs.linenCareQuestion: How do I care for linen products?
FAQs.linenCareAnswer: Linen can be machine-washed on a gentle cycle and air-dried to avoid shrinking.
FAQs.fabricOptionsQuestion: What fabric options are available for customization?
FAQs.fabricOptionsAnswer: We offer a range of fabrics including silk, linen, cashmere, and more. Contact us for details.
FAQs.turnaroundTimeQuestion: What is the turnaround time for custom orders?
FAQs.turnaroundTimeAnswer: Custom orders typically take 2-4 weeks, depending on the complexity.
FAQs.designConsultationQuestion: Can I have a design consultation?
FAQs.designConsultationAnswer: Yes, we offer design consultations. Please schedule an appointment with us.
FAQs.designChangeQuestion: Can I change the design after placing my order?
FAQs.designChangeAnswer: Design changes may be possible before production starts. Contact us immediately.
FAQs.sizeAdjustmentQuestion: Can I adjust the size after my order is placed?
FAQs.sizeAdjustmentAnswer: Size adjustments are possible before production. Please reach out to us.
FAQs.warrantyQuestion: Do your products come with a warranty?
FAQs.warrantyAnswer: Yes, we offer a 6-month warranty on manufacturing defects.
FAQs.privacyPolicyAnswer: We protect your personal information and do not share it with third parties.
FAQs.returnPolicyDetailsQuestion: What are the details of your return policy?
FAQs.returnPolicyDetailsAnswer: Items can be returned within 7 days if unworn and in original condition.
FAQs.giftCardAnswer: Yes, we offer gift cards in various denominations. Contact us to purchase.
FAQs.giftCardUseQuestion: How can I use my gift card?
FAQs.giftCardUseAnswer: Enter the gift card code at checkout to apply the balance to your order.
FAQs.contactSupportQuestion: How can I contact customer support?
FAQs.contactSupportAnswer: You can reach us via email, phone, or our website’s contact form.
FAQs.supportHoursAnswer: Our support team is available Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM.
FAQs.responseTimeQuestion: What is your response time for inquiries?
FAQs.responseTimeAnswer: We aim to respond to inquiries within 24-48 hours.
FAQs.submitFeedbackAnswer: You can submit feedback through our website or by emailing us.
FAQs.complaintProcessQuestion: What is the process for handling complaints?
FAQs.complaintProcessAnswer: We’ll investigate your complaint and respond within 5 business days.
FAQs.currencyQuestion: What currency do you accept for international orders?
FAQs.currencyAnswer: We accept payments in USD, with conversions available at checkout.
FAQs.languageSupportQuestion: Do you offer customer support in other languages?
FAQs.languageSupportAnswer: Yes, we offer support in English and Vietnamese.
FAQs.internationalReturnsAnswer: International returns follow the same policy, but shipping fees apply.
FAQs.importDutiesQuestion: Will I need to pay import duties?
FAQs.importDutiesAnswer: Import duties may apply depending on your country’s regulations.
FAQs.dutyResponsibilityQuestion: Who is responsible for import duties?
FAQs.dutyResponsibilityAnswer: The customer is responsible for any import duties or taxes.
FAQs.discountCodeQuestion: How do I use a discount code?
FAQs.discountCodeAnswer: Enter the discount code at checkout to apply the discount.
FAQs.promotionEligibilityAnswer: Promotions are available to all customers unless specified otherwise.
FAQs.combineOffersAnswer: Most offers cannot be combined. Check the terms of each promotion.
FAQs.loyaltyProgramQuestion: Do you have a loyalty program?
FAQs.loyaltyProgramAnswer: Yes, our loyalty program rewards repeat customers with points.
FAQs.earnPointsQuestion: How can I earn loyalty points?
FAQs.earnPointsAnswer: You earn points with every purchase, which can be redeemed for discounts.
FAQs.fashionShowParticipationQuestion: Can I participate in your fashion shows?
FAQs.fashionShowParticipationAnswer: We invite select clients to our fashion shows. Contact us for details.
FAQs.eventTicketsQuestion: How can I get tickets to your events?
FAQs.eventTicketsAnswer: Event tickets are available through our website or by invitation.
FAQs.eventScheduleQuestion: Where can I find your event schedule?
FAQs.eventScheduleAnswer: Our event schedule is posted on our website and social media.
FAQs.collaborationQuestion: Do you collaborate with other brands?
FAQs.collaborationAnswer: Yes, we occasionally collaborate with other brands. Stay tuned for updates.
FAQs.designerPartnershipQuestion: Can I propose a designer partnership?
FAQs.designerPartnershipAnswer: We’re open to partnerships. Please submit your proposal via our website.
